import React from 'react' import { Allrestaurants } from '../../../interfaces/Restaurant' import { CarouselDiv, RestaurantDiv, RestaurantImg, RestaurantName, TitleDesktop } from '../ChefOfTheWeek/StyleChefDetails' import { RestChefName } from './StylePopularRests' export default function DesktopPopularRests() { return (
POPULAR RESTAURANTS IN EPICURE: {Allrestaurants.slice(0,4).map((restaurant,index)=>( {restaurant.name} {restaurant.ChefName} ))}
) }
